channel.title: Shops and Pking
channel.description: Ok, I'm going to delete some shops. Where do I go? Also, I want to add a few where do I go? Second, I got a new source. But, the "home" is a pking zone, even though there isn't a skull, I want to make it non-pking. Could somebody give me a full explanation how? Well I want to make it a safezone. Thanks, 2xbladex2

item.title: Shops and Pking
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

tabs, thats why copy and paste doesnt work well.
also if u want to add a shop to an npc u would usually use

wanneShop =  #

that should go under the npcs id in client.java
im sure you have other shops so just search for “wanneshop” and you should find out where to put it

there for in your shop file, you will add something like so

shop    =    #    shopname    2    2    itemid    itemamount

if ur going to copy my code, make sure you tab it out correctly so it will look clean
if u want to add more items then just keep adding “tab itemid tab itemamount” <- repeat

Read full topic

item.title: Shops and Pking
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

for the the shops if you want to delete some, and then add some. Just go into shops.cfg and search for the name of the shop you want to delete. Just change the name. Then delete the items and their amounts. Then instead of adding new shops just put items in then put the amount in.

THis is a shop in my server:

shop = 39	Magic_store					2	2	554	5000	555	5000	556	5000	557	5000	558	5000	559	5000	562	5000	561	5000	560	2000	563	5000	564	5000	565	5000	566	5000	1391	5	1379	5	1389	5	2415	10	2416	10	2417	10	1381	20	1383	20	1385	20	1387	20

The 554 at the front is the item id. Then the # following it is the amount of tht number.

If you have any questions please ask.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops and Pking
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

ok so you are going to want to get two corners.
the top left corner of what you want nonwild, and the bottom left.

copy this code right here

(absX >=x1  && absX <=x2 && absY >=y2  && absY <=y1 ) ||

basicly saying the top left x and y are x1 and y1 and the bottom left are x2 and y2

remember to put it in the codey x1 x2 y2 y1 or else it wont work.
like this

(absX >= 2  && absX <= 4 && absY >= 1  && absY <= 3 ) ||

so the code would look like the above

Read full topic

item.title: Shops and Pking
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:

u have to search for nonwild and let me know if u get anything if u do i can help if not srry[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2008, 03:12:57 pm[/size][hr]o and btw you prolly either make it a safe zone or just change the spawn point and make a new home all together and i could also help with most of that
